room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: My family played the Hostage for my birthday. It was our first time playing the break out games. It was a great bonding experience which we talked and laughed about for a couple of hours afterwards. It was tough and maybe a little too complex for our first game. Our game master who was great said we picked the hardest game. We didn't break out but had fun trying.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: I went to the Hostage Breakout room and it was very elaborate and very cool! If you haven't done one of these yet, you definitely should. I plan to go back and try more of the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: My husband and I had a blast! We almost finished Hostage room with just the two of us and itâ€™s a room for 6. Gotta put your minds to it!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: We had a blast! The staff was great and helped add to the experience.the game was extremely well thought out and just challenging enough.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Lexington in Lexington
review: A group of friends and I went for my birthday party and the experience was incredible. The staff members were helpful, funny,and enjoyable to interact with. The game was challenging yet exciting as we worked together to find clues. We all want to try another room, I recommend this for anyone to do with friends and family. No special occassion necessary. Just have a great time!
